articles.author: Shivendra Kumar
articles.title: Infosys, TCS tumble up to 27% as IT meltdown drags Nifty vs global peers. Where's the heartbeat index headed?
articles.description: India's Nifty index shows modest one-year returns, lagging global peers. The IT sector, particularly Infosys and TCS, has dragged performance down. Financials, however, have been strong performers, delivering significant returns. Analysts anticipate a constru…
articles.content: Indias heartbeat index, Nifty, has delivered modest one-year returns of around 6%, lagging its global peers. The underperformance can be largely traced to the IT sector and particularly to heavyweigh… [+5112 chars]

articles.author: Dongdong Wang, Zhe Chen, Chunyu Xu, Xuyao Jiao, Min Yue, Xiang Gao
articles.title: Functional synergy of heteropentameric B subunits underlies virulence in a Salmonella A2B5 toxin
articles.description: Author summary AB5 toxins are critical virulence factors in bacterial pathogens, but the assembly mechanisms and functional roles of their B subunits remain poorly understood. Our study reveals a novel heteropentameric toxin assembly mechanism in Salmonella d…
